results.title: Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice
results.text_hl: Similarly, it inhibits @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@inflammatory pain@@@ more predominantly than @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neurogenic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001750 @@@neurogenic@@@, and hence @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can be used in @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ conditions like @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@ and @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ particularly when there is coexisting @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Katole NT, Kale JS, Salankar HV. Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice Cureus. 2022 Jul;14(7):e26910. PMID: 35983393
